entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:04 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain or drizzle this morning. Showers beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this morning. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
